q: Sunday, Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell ( R-Ky.) told host David Letterman Gregory that he did not "have much to add" to what Hillary Clinton had said on how the administration was handling the uprising. I don't have any criticism of Barack Obama or Secretary Hillary Clinton at this point, Mitch McConnell added after he was pressed by Gregory. But, he added, I have to take everyone's opinions into account, including the show's other producers and the network. He is clearly someone who could carry on the remarkable success of Mitch Daniels , Dan Coats says. "I am going to strongly encourage him to run. I know he's going to take a little time to assess it, but I hope he's our next governor."
